EnglishValue: As an oilfield technology and trading company, we provide operation services as its products, and follows the standard of “Operation First” when delivering services to clients. Grand Qilin also provides a wide range of investment opportunities in developing oil field, field services and crude oil blending and trading.  We look forward to cooperate with all industry partners from all around the world.

ChinaValue: 选择最佳的组分组合以生产最终成品是交易商和炼油厂面临的最重要的经济问题之一。调和比简单的组分混合要复杂得多。

EnglishValue: to optimize commercial value, to upgrade or reduce oil consumption to meet specifications, and to facilitate oil movement.
ChinaValue: 优化商业价值，提高或降低油耗以满足规格，并促进石油运输。

EnglishValue: Grand Qilin Oil are resourcing and allocating worldwide crude oil to various port for blending and trading crude oil, so as
ChinaValue: ""金麒麟石油正在将全球范围内的原油资源配置到各个港口进行调和和交易。该策略旨在优化原油的商业价值，确保最终产品的质量和一致性，满足不同市场的规格要求，并促进石油的高效运输和分配。

EnglishValue: Blending oil involves mixing two or more different types of oils to achieve a desired balance of fatty acids, stability, and functional properties.
ChinaValue: 调和油涉及将两种或更多不同类型的油混合，以达到所需的脂肪酸平衡、稳定性和功能特性。

EnglishValue: Oil and Gas Gathering Chemical Product

The chemical technology and product of Grand Qilin Oil is targeted to solve all difficulties in the whole process of oil and gas production, to help clients improve the safety and speed of drilling, to enrich stimulation technology, to increase the oil recovery rate, to help clients reduce the cost of oil and gas gathering, to improve oil and gas gathering efficiency.
ChinaValue: 金麒麟石油的化学技术和产品旨在解决油气生产全过程中的所有困难，帮助客户提高钻井的安全性和速度，丰富刺激技术，提高石油采收率，帮助客户降低油气集输成本，提高油气集输效率。

EnglishValue: Grand Qilin Oil utilize some of the cutting-edge developments in reservoir characterization technology within the industry comprise high-resolution imaging techniques, data analysis tools, advanced modeling algorithms, and leveraging big data analytics, AI, and ML technologies for informed strategic decisions.
ChinaValue: 金麒麟石油利用了一些业内最前沿的储层表征技术，包括高分辨率成像技术、数据分析工具、先进的建模算法，并利用大数据分析、人工智能和机器学习技术作出明智的战略决策

EnglishValue: successful reservoir management requires understanding the structure of the reservoir, the distribution of fluids within the reservoir, drilling and maintaining wells which can produce fluids from the reservoir, transport and processing of produced fluids, refining and marketing the fluids, safely abandoning the reservoir when it can no longer produce, and mitigating the environmental impact of operations throughout the life cycle of the reservoir.
ChinaValue: 成功的储层管理需要了解储层的结构、储层内流体的分布、钻探和维护能够从储层中生产流体的井、生产流体的运输和处理、流体的精炼和销售、在储层无法再生产时安全废弃储层，并在储层整个生命周期中减轻作业对环境的影响。

EnglishValue: Grand Qilin Oil has rich experience in the allocation of resources to optimize hydrocarbon recovery from a reservoir while minimizing capital investments and operating expenses
ChinaValue: 金麒麟石油在资源分配方面经验丰富，能够在优化油气藏碳氢化合物回收的同时，将资本投资和运营费用降至最低。

EnglishValue: Combination of stimulation related engineering technology and geological technology, supported with digital technology, financial resources, human resources services etc.

EnglishValue: Leading new coiled tubing technology in China, intelligent service providers that combine coiled tubing with cable and optical fiber.

ChinaValue: 我们在页岩气和致密气压裂服务方面拥有丰富的经验。

EnglishValue: Focusing on the research of unconventional oil and gas stimulation technology, supported with characteristic suspension technology, temporary plugging and water control technology etc.
ChinaValue: 专注于非常规油气增产技术的研究，并辅以特色悬浮技术、临时封堵和控水技术等。

EnglishValue: It has advanced biosynthetic base, high-performance oil base / desulphonated water base, solid free brine drilling and completion fluid, intelligent mud technology and mud station operation and maintenance
ChinaValue: 具有先进的生物合成基础、高性能油基/脱磺水基、无固体盐水钻井和完井液、智能泥浆技术以及泥浆站运营和维护。

EnglishValue: It can provide real-time optimization of drilling parameters, remote visualization, operability and intelligence
ChinaValue: 可以提供钻井参数的实时优化、远程可视化、可操作性和智能化。

EnglishValue: It has advanced LWD/MWD tools and rotary guide tools, perfect side drilling supporting technology, and rich experience in drilling construction of various wells and well types. It can provide advanced technology services such as directional, rotary geological guidance, side drilling, downhole connectivity, double branch wells, and integrated drilling tools such as comprehensive acceleration
ChinaValue: 它拥有先进的随钻测井/随钻测量工具和旋转导向工具、完善的侧钻支撑技术，以及丰富的各种井和井型的钻井施工经验。它可以提供定向、旋转地质导向、侧钻、井下连接、双分支井等先进技术服务，以及综合加速等综合钻井工具。

EnglishValue: We provide services covering directional wells, drilling and completion fluids, cementing and oilfield environmental protection ，It has a series of key drilling technologies, characterized by measurement while drilling and steering technology, downhole tool integration, environmental protection drilling and completion fluid system.
ChinaValue: 我们提供涵盖定向井、钻井和完井液、固井及油田环保的服务，拥有一系列关键钻井技术，其特点是随钻测量和导向技术、井下工具集成、环保钻井和完井液系统。

EnglishValue: Rich experiences in oil and gas reservoir research in worldwide, covering oil and gas fields in China, Iraq, Iran and etc, involving various types of reservoirs such as conventional sandstone, carbonate, tight sandstone, coal seam, shale, etc.
ChinaValue: 在全球范围内的油气藏研究方面拥有丰富经验，涵盖中国、伊拉克、伊朗等地的油气田，涉及各种类型的油藏，如常规砂岩、碳酸盐岩、致密砂岩、煤层、页岩等。
